00013     template<typename T>
00014     void Remove_Placeholders::clean_selector_list(T r) {
00015 
00016         // Create a new selector group without placeholders
00017         Selector_List* sl = static_cast<Selector_List*>(r->selector());
00018 
00019         if (sl) {
00020             Selector_List* new_sl = new (ctx.mem) Selector_List(sl->pstate());
00021 
00022             for (size_t i = 0, L = sl->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00023                 if (!(*sl)[i]->has_placeholder()) {
00024                     *new_sl << (*sl)[i];
00025                 }
00026             }
00027 
00028             // Set the new placeholder selector list
00029             r->selector(new_sl);
00030         }
00031 
00032         // Iterate into child blocks
00033         Block* b = r->block();
00034 
00035         for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00036             Statement* stm = (*b)[i];
00037             stm->perform(this);
00038         }
00039     }
00040 
00041     void Remove_Placeholders::operator()(Block* b) {
00042         for (size_t i = 0, L = b->length(); i < L; ++i) {
00043             (*b)[i]->perform(this);
00044         }
00045     }
00046 
00047     void Remove_Placeholders::operator()(Ruleset* r) {
00048         clean_selector_list(r);
00049     }
00050 
00051     void Remove_Placeholders::operator()(Media_Block* m) {
00052         clean_selector_list(m);
00053     }
00054 
00055     void Remove_Placeholders::operator()(At_Rule* a) {
00056         if (a->block()) a->block()->perform(this);
00057     }
